name: Wc-beanstream
body:
wc-beanstream ============= WooCommerce Beanstream Payment Gateway
This extension allows you to accept payments in WooCommerce via Beanstream.
Compatible With WooCommerce 2.1.x or higher ### Install WooCommerce Beanstream Payment Gateway 1. unzip the wp-beanstream-master.zip file and upload to wp-content/plugins directory. Then activate the plugin through the Plugins section in WordPress
2. Update Beanstream Admin Settings
3. On the Woocommerce Menu > Settings > Checkout Tabs > Beanstream Payment Gateway, update the fields according to your shop needs.
### Official Website http://www.scriptcombo.com/ ### Donation Do you like this plugin? Please reward it with a little donation. donate to this link http://goo.gl/9f3SlZ
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
